trans-unit.source: Represents the default settings for <xref:System.Data.DataView.ApplyDefaultSort*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.DataViewManager*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowStateFilter*>, <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort*>, and <xref:System.Data.DataView.Table*> for DataViews created from the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Representa as predefinições para <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, <> </> *>, e <> </> *> para DataViews criados a partir de <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to use the default sort.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve utilizar a ordenação de predefinição.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the default sort is used; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se for utilizada a ordem predefinida; caso contrário <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.
Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewManager"> </xref> que contém esta <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the filter to apply in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define o filtro a aplicar no <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: See <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter*> for a code sample using RowFilter.
trans-unit.target: Consulte <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter*>para um exemplo de código com RowFilter.</xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter*>

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the filter to apply.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia que contém o filtro a aplicar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating whether to display Current, Deleted, Modified Current, ModifiedOriginal, New, Original, Unchanged, or no rows in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica se deve apresentar o atual, Deleted, modificado atual, ModifiedOriginal, novo, Original, Unchanged ou não existem linhas no <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The default value of RowStateFilter is `DataViewRowState.CurrentRows`.
trans-unit.target: O valor predefinido de RowStateFilter é `DataViewRowState.CurrentRows`.

trans-unit.source: A value that indicates which rows to display.
trans-unit.target: Um valor que indica quais as linhas a apresentar.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating the sort to apply in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Obtém ou define um valor que indica a ordenação para aplicar no <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> can have two defaults based on the value of <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>Pode ter dois predefinições com base no valor de <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A></xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A> is null or empty (that is, the value is not explicitly specified), the <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in the <xref:System.Data.DataView> is sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Se <xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>é nulo ou está vazio (ou seja, o valor não explicitamente especificado), o <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>no <xref:System.Data.DataView>é ordenado na posição ou ordinal de <xref:System.Data.DataRow>no <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.RowFilter%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A> default, an empty string, causes a <xref:System.Data.DataRowView> in <xref:System.Data.DataView> to be sorted on the position or ordinal of <xref:System.Data.DataRow> in the <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>predefinido, uma cadeia vazia, faz com que um <xref:System.Data.DataRowView>no <xref:System.Data.DataView>ser ordenado na posição ou ordinal de <xref:System.Data.DataRow>no <xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A>coleção.</xref:System.Data.DataTable.Rows%2A> </xref:System.Data.DataRow> </xref:System.Data.DataView> </xref:System.Data.DataRowView> </xref:System.Data.DataView.Sort%2A>

trans-unit.source: The sort to apply in the <xref href="System.Data.DataView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A ordenação para aplicar no <xref href="System.Data.DataView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"></xref> to which the <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"></xref> properties apply.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Data.DataTable"> </xref> ao qual o <xref href="System.Data.DataViewSetting"> </xref> aplicam propriedades.
